summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1437, for the improvement of Thirty-sixth Avenue, from East James Street to East Spring Street; Thirty-seventh Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Marion Street; East Marion Street and East Columbia Street, each from Thirty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-seventh Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and stairways, under Ordinance No. 15533 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
